#summary Upload an asset to the asset service.
#labels Protocol-Asset

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||X-Asset-Id||UUID of the asset||UUID||Optional||
||X-Asset-Creator-Id||UUID of the Creator||UUID||Yes||

{{{
POST /assets/ HTTP/1.1
X-Asset-Creator-Id: 5a514c21-1278-4f85-b28c-3cda253c98e4
X-Asset-Id: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
Content-Length: 42574
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=----------------------------3bace003519d

------------------------------3bace003519d
Content-Type: image/tga

(raw asset data)
------------------------------3bace003519d--
}}}

  * If X-Asset-Id is specified and the asset ID already exists, the old asset will be replaced
  * Only one asset upload is allowed per request

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||Location||Location the new asset can be retrieved from||URI||
||X-Asset-Id||UUID of the asset||UUID||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
Date: Wed, 09 Dec 2009 08:00:00 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Asset Server
Location: /assets/f54a2666-30d7-4cdc-ac6c-ea96e075e528
X-Asset-Id: f54a2666-30d7-4cdc-ac6c-ea96e075e528
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * An existing asset was updated
  * 201
    * A new asset was successfully created
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred

= Code Examples =

PHP:

{{{
$r = new HttpRequest('http://services.example.com/', HttpRequest::METH_POST, array("timeout"=>5,"useragent"=>"Example Services Client"));
$r->addHeaders($headers);
$r->AddPostFile(UUID::Random(), "eyewhite.tga", "image/tga");
$r->send();
}}}
